title: Pentel WOW! Retractable Ballpoint Pens, Medium Point, Black Ink, Dozen (BK440-A)
highlights: Retractable ballpoint pens for ease of use
Black ink has a rich color for excellent readability

description.header: Fill out paperwork and write notes with this 12-pack of Pentel WOW! 1.0mm black retractable ballpoint pens.
description.paragraph: Get your writing noticed with these 1.0mm black retractable ballpoint pens. The retractable design makes these pens easy to stow away without staining pockets or bags, while the cushy grips make writing more comfortable. These Pentel WOW! black retractable ballpoint pens come in a pack of 12 and feature 1.0mm tips for producing thick, bold lines that stand out.
bullets: Retractable ballpoint pens for ease of use
Black ink has a rich color for excellent readability
Features a pocket clip for convenient carrying
